short_summary: Jabra Biz 2300 USB MS Headsets or equivalent for Royal Canadian Mounted Police
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for Jabra Biz 2300 USB mono and stereo headsets and the procurement details are as follows: delivery destination area: Ottawa ON; delivery date: 60 federal government working days from contract award; security requirements: N/A; comprehensive land claim agreements: N/A.  Bids must be submitted only to the P2P portal for RFQ Submission by the date, time and place indicated on page 1 of the RFQ.
tags: Jabra Biz 2300 USB Mono MS PTT Headset
Jabra Biz 2300 USB Stereo MS PTT Headset
